text: <@U1MA81VBK|g_alexander> has joined the channel
The chaincode throws an error when trying to store an empty string on the blockchain: `err = stub.PutState("Test", []byte(""))` -> `Failed to handle PUT_STATE. Sending ERROR`. Is it by design?

<@U0PB67X4K>  there is a signature struct parameter in registeruserreq through grpc i am setting some values in signature but it is giving me this error
UNKNOWN: Signature verification failed.

what  and how does we have to assign the values to the parameters in signature any doc on that?
hi guys,  when i add a new validator peer (using PBFT),  the new peer can't sync  blocks from the others,  who can help me?
<@U2FR6FUJV> presently, with the v0.6 architecture, it is not possible to add members to a network
as we begin delivering on the ‘v1.0’ architecture, it will be possible to add certain elements (endorsers, initially and eventually consenters)
<@U1BENKMD0|andreaturli> has joined the channel
<@U0KM61BCP>  do you konw when the 'v1.0"  maybe released?
<@U25R83TAP|thomas.marckx> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/thomas.marckx/F2GGDEDC0/pasted_image_at_2016_09_27_04_59_pm.png|Pasted image at 2016-09-27, 4:59 PM>

I’m having difficulties enrolling new users.
Currently I just add them in the membersrvc.yaml, after which I delete everything in /var/hyperledger/production.
I rebuild the membersrvc and run it 
(I also start a new peer).
This works sometimes but now I keep receiving the following error
```{ Error: 'rpc error: code = 2 desc = Identity or token does not match.' }```

I understand that password in the yaml is view as a one-time, but I expect this be “reset” when I delete everything in production
Anyone have an explanation ?
<@U25R83TAP>  thanks, where i can get these information?

<@U2FR6FUJV> I’m not sure where I found it. :slightly_smiling_face: 
Just keep your eye on the slack channels and useful information will pass by ….
perhaps <@U0KM61BCP> knows where these kinds of administrative documents are centralised
<@U25R83TAP> currently, you can only add new users dynamically using the nodeSDK
<@U2FR6FUJV> we have a goal of getting v1.0 out early 2017 as seen in the graph above
for fabric, look in the old wiki - we haven’t yet migrated the content to the new hyperledger wiki <https://github.com/hyperledger-archives/fabric/wiki>

attachments.title: hyperledger-archives/fabric
attachments.text: THIS IS A READ-ONLY historic repository. Current development is at <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/admin/projects/fabric> . pull requests not accepted

text: <@U0KM61BCP>  it is not possible to add  validator members to a network.  i want the non validator peer to sync the blocks dynamically, do you think it is easy to implement this?

our architecture has changed for v1 and we don’t plan to pursue enhancements to the architecture in v0.6… however, as noted, it will be possible to add endorser peers - but the set of consenters/orderers will be fixed for v1 and we’ll look at making the set of consenters dynamic post v1.0 release

<@U2FR6FUJV> ,  take a look at the proposed architecture in <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/gitweb?p=fabric.git;a=blob;f=proposals/r1/Next-Consensus-Architecture-Proposal.md;h=cb01e36f6456ea775938347c9022c1099da4c0ea;hb=HEAD>
cbf beat me to it but I think what you want to do maps to adding validators in the new architecture
Posting new playbacks to the <#C28M6TC90|playbacks> channel here on slack. See the latest development and thinking by the community, and feel free to ask questions and get involved.
<@U0UGH3X7X>  thanks,   i don't have so much time waiting for the v1.0, i must find a solution base the v0.6 version,
<@U2GJPRFRQ|jessewalia> has joined the channel
<@U25R83TAP> <@U2FR6FUJV> : the timeline comes from NextGen Consensus ppt wriiten by <@U0KN2SSKE> you can search for it in Slack
<@U2FR6FUJV> what are your requirements?
